meanings.definition: Stay away from school without permission.
meanings.sent1: She truanted from school to go to the park with her friends.
meanings.sent2: The student truanted yesterday and missed an important test.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat truanted from the litter box and made a mess.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts truanted to happier times as he sat in detention.
meanings.sent5: The idea of truanting seemed thrilling until she faced the consequences.

meanings.definition: Absent oneself from school without permission.
meanings.sent1: He truanted from school to attend a concert in the city.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends truanted together and spent the day at the beach.
meanings.sent3: The dog truanted from obedience class and caused chaos at home.
meanings.sent4: Her mind truanted to a tropical island while she sat in math class.
meanings.sent5: The boy regretted truanting when he realized he missed an exciting science experiment.
